mapper.update:
update business
sxmsystemid = #{sxmsystemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shortname = #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
corporations = #{corporations,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accredittime = #{accredittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where businessid = #{businessid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update business set sxmsystemid = #{sxmsystemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shortname = #{shortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, corporations = #{corporations,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accredittime = #{accredittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where businessid = #{businessid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select b.*,IFNULL(iib.isocidentificationbusinessid,0) identificationstatus from business b left join ( select * from ( select * from isoc_identification_business where enddate > now() order by enddate desc limit 0,1000000000 ) sss group by businessid ) iib on b.businessid = iib.businessid
and b.fullname like concat('%', #{business.fullname}, '%')
and iib.isocidentificationbusinessid > 0
and iib.isocidentificationbusinessid is null
group by b.createtime desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from business b left join ( select * from ( select * from isoc_identification_business where enddate > now() order by enddate desc limit 0,1000000000 ) sss group by businessid ) iib on b.businessid = iib.businessid
and b.fullname like concat('%', #{business.fullname}, '%')
and iib.isocidentificationbusinessid > 0
and iib.isocidentificationbusinessid is null

select b.*,IFNULL(iib.isocidentificationbusinessid,0) identificationstatus,3 from business b left join ( select * from ( select * from isoc_identification_business where enddate > now() order by enddate desc limit 0,1000000000 ) sss group by businessid ) iib on b.businessid = iib.businessid where b.businessid = #{businessid,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 0,1
